mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wilmington Station changed its name to Joseph R. Biden, Jr. Railroad Station at a public ceremony on 19 March 2011, in honor of U.S. Vice President Joe Biden, who took over 7,000 round trips from the station during his U.S. Senate career. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilmington_Station [work]
